subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury scored 40 points Tuesday night, but missed a free throw with nine-tenths of a second left as the Knicks failed to take another step up the Eastern Conference standings.
snippet: Stephon Marbury scored 40 points Tuesday night, but missed a free throw with nine-tenths of a second left as the Knicks failed to take another step up the Eastern Conference standings.
